original_text:
Cleopatra PLUS

Con la slot online Cleopatra Plus IGT è arrivato a produrre il terzo gioco ispirato all’antico Egitto. I simboli sui rulli includono Aset, Bastet, Hathor, Amun, Ra e Anubi, oltre antichi manufatti egiziani e carte da gioco standard. Graficamente la slot Cleopatra 2 è abbastanza simile all’originale, il gioco è infatti ambientato tra le piramidi di notte. Il gameplay segue la classica struttura a 5 rulli con 40 linee di pagamento, ma con alcune novità per quanto riguarda i bonus.

Sorprese inaspettate

Funzione Level Up Plus, che ti premierà su vari fronti,
Funzione Stacked 2x Wilds in cui 2 wild in una vittoria raddoppiano il tuo risultato,
Raccolta Follower. Per salire di livello accumula un certo numero di nuovi “follower”. Otterrai 1 follower per ogni simbolo bonus che appare sui rulli. Quando raggiungi livelli più alti, sbloccherai un nuovo simbolo bonus che ti darà 2 o 3 follower. Raggiungere determinati livelli ti darà accesso a Mappe Bonus, divinità in pila su ogni bobina, a moltiplicatori e alla funzione Super Spin.
Mappe Bonus ti serviranno per vincere fino a 30 giri gratuiti aggiuntivi, un moltiplicatore fino a 5x, un ultimo moltiplicatore di giri gratuito fino a 50x e fino a 10 Super giri. Alessandria, Valle del Nilo o Piramidi di Giza sono le mappe disponibili, ma non tutte sono raggiungibili finché non sbloccherai determinati livelli all’interno del gioco. Tutte le mappe restituiscono lo stesso ad eccezione delle Piramidi di Giza ai livelli 7-8.


Usa il tuo simbolo portafortuna
Cleopatra Plus può sembrare un po’ complicato, ma giocandoci spesso in modalità demo, potrai capire meglio tutte le nuove funzionalità e passare presto alla versione con soldi reali per vivere appieno questa avventura e sentirti come un vero faraone con le sue enormi ricchezze! Non dimenticare di scegliere il tuo simbolo portafortuna della divinità egizia che ti aiuterà lungo il cammino. Il simbolo con il valore più alto è il logo Cleopatra Plus, che è anche il jolly e ti premia 1.500 volte la tua linea puntata per 5 su una linea di pagamento. Non ti resta che selezionare Cleopatra Plus da uno dei nostri casinò in elenco e partire all’esplorazione di tesori nascosti senza registrazione e senza bisogno di scaricare nulla.

raw_translation.response:
Cleopatra PLUS

With the online slot game Cleopatra Plus, IGT has produced its third game inspired by ancient Egypt. The symbols on the reels include Aset, Bastet, Hathor, Amun, Ra and Anubi, as well as ancient Egyptian artifacts and standard playing cards. Graphically, Cleopatra 2 slot is quite similar to the original, as the game is set among the pyramids at night. The gameplay follows the classic structure of 5 reels with 40 paylines, but with some new features for bonuses. 

Unexpected surprises

Level Up Plus feature, which rewards you on various fronts,
Stacked 2x Wilds feature in which 2 wilds in a win double your result,
Follower Collection. To level up, accumulate a certain number of new "followers". You will get 1 follower for every bonus symbol that appears on the reels. When you reach higher levels, you'll unlock a new bonus symbol that will give you 2 or 3 followers. Reaching certain levels will give you access to Bonus Maps, deities stacked on every reel, multipliers and the Super Spin feature.
Bonus Maps will help you win up to 30 extra free spins, a multiplier up to 5x, a final multiplier of free spins up to 50x and up to 10 Super spins. Alexandria, Nile Valley or Giza Pyramids are the available maps, but some are not accessible until certain levels are unlocked within the game. All maps return the same except for the Giza Pyramids at levels 7-8.

Use your lucky symbol
Cleopatra Plus may seem a bit complicated, but by playing it frequently in demo mode, you'll better understand all the new features and quickly move on to the real money version to fully experience this adventure and feel like a true pharaoh with its enormous riches! Don't forget to choose your lucky symbol of the Egyptian deity that will help you along the way. The symbol with the highest value is the Cleopatra Plus logo, which is also the wild and rewards you 1,500 times your bet line for 5 on a payline. You just have to choose Cleopatra Plus from one of our listed casinos and embark on the exploration of hidden treasures without registration and without the need to download anything.

Cleopatra Plus is an online slot game in which players can win rewards through different bonus features. It follows the classic structure of 5 reels with 40 paylines, with symbols on the reels such as Aset, Bastet, Hathor, Amun, Ra, Anubi, ancient Egyptian artifacts, and standard playing cards.

Symbols and structure of the game

Cleopatra Plus is set among the pyramids at night, with symbols on the reels such as Aset, Bastet, Hathor, Amun, Ra, Anubi, ancient Egyptian artifacts, and standard playing cards. The Cleopatra Plus logo is the wild and rewards players 1,500 times their bet line for 5 on a payline. Players choose their lucky symbol of the Egyptian deity that will help them along the way.

Bonus Maps and Follower Collection

Cleopatra Plus has new features for bonuses such as the Level Up Plus feature, which rewards players on various fronts. There's also the Stacked 2x Wilds feature, in which 2 wilds in a win double players' results. To level up, players accumulate a certain number of new "followers". Players get 1 follower for every bonus symbol that appears on the reels. When players reach higher levels, they'll unlock a new bonus symbol that will give them 2 or 3 followers. Reaching certain levels will give players access to Bonus Maps, deities stacked on every reel, multipliers and the Super Spin feature. Bonus Maps will help players win up to 30 extra free spins, a multiplier up to 5x, a final multiplier of free spins up to 50x and up to 10 Super spins. Alexandria, Nile Valley or Giza Pyramids are the available maps, but some are not accessible until certain levels are unlocked within the game. All maps return the same except for the Giza Pyramids at levels 7-8.

Playing and winning strategies

Cleopatra Plus may seem a bit complicated for some players, but playing it frequently in demo mode will help players understand all the new features and quickly move on to the real money version to fully experience this adventure and feel like a true pharaoh with its enormous riches! Players can place their followers on different reels to have different prizes or on the same reel to win the same prize several times.

Software provider - IGT

Cleopatra Plus is a product of IGT, a famous software house that also produced other online slot games such as Crown of Egypt, Golden City, and Maya Magic. Players can access a complete list of all the slots produced by this software provider on SlotJava.

Choosing an online casino to play

Players can choose an online casino like Snai, Starcasino or Starvegas, which are all licensed in Italy and can guarantee 100% safety. SlotJava gives players an overview of the best online casinos and promotions offered. Players can play Cleopatra Plus for free on SlotJava, without needing to download a program or register. Players can also bet their real money and avail many bonus offers without depositing real money, a major advantage of online gaming.
